hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\purple{2+2}&\purple{=1+4}\\
\purple{4}&\purple{=5}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $4$ is not the same as $5$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{4+5}&\pink{=3+7}\\
\pink{9}&\pink{=10}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $9$ is not the same as $10$.

$\begin{align}
\blue{3+2}&\blue{=1+4}\\
\blue{5}&\blue{=5}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $5$ is the same as $5$.
